name: Lazy Sunday Apocalypse
description:
:Oh No! A meteor is inbound on Earth, but your friend Chacter (pronounced kak-turr) is too cozy to get into the bunker! Quick, save him!!!

Controls:

WASD/arrows - move

Q - blow airhorn (very loud)

Recommended fullscreen - the GUI is a bit offset otherwise

Credits:

Art - Myself

Programming - My Brother
